data.title: Great local spot
data.text: All about locals at this one, far better than some of the others.  Very friendly, great lunches and a super place to watch games on the weekend.

data.title: Neighborhood bar
data.text: Used to be a nice place for "regulars" but recently has appeared to be going to a different type of clientele.

data.title: Excellent quality food, reasonable drink prices, excellent service
data.text: We have eaten here a number of times since moving to Rochester Hills two years ago.  The daily lunch specials here are simply an excellent quality, excellent taste and very good value for the money.  Steak tips, special sandwiches, special burger offerings, and their cold water cod fish and chips are some of the best fish and chips we have eaten here or abroad.  Their kitchen staff obviously is way better than the average pub.  Service is fast, efficient, effective.  Waitresses are pleasant, observant and remember who you are and what you like.  Not many neighborhood places like this are around anymore, and this location feels more like a owner pub than a chain.  The staff seems to appreciate the patrons and wants them to be happy.  A rare experience in any place we frequent.  Recommend this place as well as we regularly see local teams of baseball kids,  soccer teams, families in here.  Yes, they have about thirty big televisions with lots of sports, but they keep the noise down enough that you can still have a conversation without shouting.  Just a really well managed and executed local pub with waaaaay better than average food.

data.title: Great Place to watch a game or hang out with friends
data.text: Have been to Hamlin Pub several times, and the food and beer are exceptional. The atmosphere is very casual, and the service is good.

data.title: Good Food, Great Entertainment
data.text: We visited the Hamlin Pub to watch one of our favorite local singers, Cliff Erickson.   Cliff didn't disappoint, but the Hamlin surprised us with good bar food.   We shared Irish Sliders and a plate of Nachos and both were very good.

data.title: Not a ton of healthy eats!
data.text: Tough deciding when trying to eat healthy, but had a great Guinness steak salad. They do have a healthy menu.

data.title: need for a good bar burger
data.text: nothing fancy, good service, great burger, when ordered rare it comes that way, fries appeared to be fresh cut

data.title: Great atmosphere, very good food and a great selection of drinks
data.text:
I've had lunch here a couple of times and have walked away full and satisfied both times. The dishes run in the roughly $8 to $11 range with pretty large portions. They also have lunch specials including a cup of soup and half a sandwich deal. The lunch specials are $6.99 and well worth it and are available until 4:00 PM as I recall.

Their chicken and dumpling stew is awesome! It's thick with big chunks of chicken and great dumplings with various veggies scattered around. Their cup size is large and pretty filling in its own right so I can't imagine how big a meal a full bowl would be. Sandwiches, burgers, sliders, pizza and salads are the primary menu items.

The staff is friendly and kept my glass of iced tea full without having to ask for more.

Seating includes the bar and a bunch of high-tops but I can remember if there are low tops, too. There are TV's scattered around the room but they are not obnoxious. Hamlin Pub is located in a an end unit of a medium-sized strip mall and there is plenty of parking.

They have six locations so if you're hungry and thirsty this is a great stop for a good and reasonably priced meal.

data.title: Cool Spot.  Nice staff.  Cool bar.
data.text:
I went there with a friend of mine who is a regular customer there...  It has a nice classy but relaxed atmosphere.  They had a decent live band when I was there which in my opinion makes it fun.  Fair prices.  Cool overall spot.

But the steak bites... Wow!  Off the charts delicious.  They make them with a worcestershire sauce and blue cheese and fresh scallions..  I'm a foodie and these were the best I've ever tasted.

data.title: Great neighborhood bar
data.text: Ask for Kelly, she is a hottie and does a great job serving her customers.  We had sliders.  A bag of them.  If we weren't on a diet, we could have had 100.  Nicer quality meat and more of it than say a certain chain where they became famous with no royalty.  Great fries that were delivered when we ordered onion rings.  Great onion rings, not onion-like mush, but actual onions.  Great sweet potato fries.  We went with friends who recommended the place and would go back in a heartbeat.  They have karaoke on Monday nights, live music on Tuesday, Friday and Saturday.

data.title: Good pizza or burgers and good value
data.text: If you want to catch the game and enjoy a good time with friends or family this is a great value with good food.  The service is also very good.

data.title: Great place for a beer and rugby.
data.text: Great burgers and pub food. Always a good game on with plenty of fans. No windows and dark the way it should be.

data.title: Good stop for a beer and pub food
data.text: Local pub with a good variety of draft and bottled beer. Lunch selections include sandwiches, burgers, fries, etc. good spot to meet up with friends. Typical pub fare.  Limited vegetarian options.  Also, a good place to watch the Detroit teams on the variety of screens around the restaurant.

data.title: Worst sandwich I've ever eaten
data.text: My husband and I went to the Hamlin Pub in Rochester Hills for a quick dinner (it's close to our house so we go there fairly often). I ordered a roast beef sandwich that was a recent addition to the menu. It was absolutely the worst sandwich I've ever eaten! As usual, the waitress came to our table and asked how everything was.  I stated that the sandwich was not good. I assumed that she would have offered to replace it with something else, but she did not. I will be a while before we go back.

data.title: Great sports pub
data.text: The Hamlin Pub has a reputation for selling huge quantities of beer, especially during the Red Wings games that show on their many TV sets.  When I first visited the Hamlin Pub, you were on the honor system.  You went to the bar, told the bartender what you had to eat and he or she rang it up.  Unfortunately, some jerks took advantage of the system and ripped off the restaurant and they had to change their policy.  However, they still have some excellent deals on burgers and beer or pop and with the no-smoking ban, it's become a much more pleasant place to dine.

data.title: Want to Know Rochester Hills, MI?
data.text: This is the place to go if you're new to Rochester / area. There are regular cafe tables and booths, a bar, and an area of community tables that extend the bar vibe. Sit at the bar or tables and strike up a conversation. The food is OK. This is a great place to watch a game. It's a legit, neighborhood bar.

data.title: won't be going back
data.text: Waitress was excellant, great service. Ordered a ruben without meat but added sliced tomato and onion, we got cheese, tomato and onion, no slaw or dressing, so it was a grilled cheese sandwich for $8.99 add the up charge for the sweet potato fries and we paid $10.48 and the quality was only fair. Too many good resturants in Troy to go back there.

data.title: ALWAYS a special
data.text: If there's a game, if there's not a game, every day of the week, etc.  No matter what day you go there there is SOMETHING on special.  Stick to the pizza or burgers.  The other items are there just to fill out the menu.

data.title: Smoke -  Health Hazard
data.text: The smoke at the Hamlin Pub is horrible (at all their restaurants/ pubs).  I don't know who designed the building but they certainly did not have health standards in mind.  It is really a shame because it is a nice restaurant, they have good food and entertainment.  I think they would get a lot more customers if they would do something about the ventilation of the restaurant.  What a health hazard.

data.title: Good place to go for a cheap draft beer and listen a band on the weekend. Usually not real smokey.
data.text: Good place to go for a cheap draft beer and listen a band on the weekend. Usually not real smokey.
